# Veiled Disciple (Trait)
## Overview
**Veiled Disciple**: Trained in espionage, youâ€™re skilled at passing messages and staying on task. You gain a +1 trait bonus on [[Bluff (Skill)|Bluff]] checks made to pass secret messages and a +1 trait bonus on saving throws against charm and compulsion effects. 

**Source:** Ultimate Campaign, pg. 61
